Summary: like a air plane crashing sideways and rainbow colors
divs: Sighting Detailsi was on the computer when i heard some people shouting outside saying"look up in they sky!"i looked and i saw the ufo i knew the ufo was of course something like a ufo because ive read many books about them ,the ufo looked like a air plane crashing side way in a rainbow of colors , after about 10 mins. it reared back up and diappered out of thin air
